comments:
Test build (20020507 - available from jeem)

1. Start Eclipse with a brand new workspace
2. Exit Eclipse

Observe: 
- no eclipse/.metadata/.log
- eclipse/.metadata/.config/platform.config but nothing else
- no eclipse/.metadata/.plugins/org.eclipse.update.core/

3. Start Eclipse with same workspace
4. Exit Eclipse
5. Open the (new) about dialog
N.B. This dialog queries update core for the ids of the configured features!

6. Exit Eclipse

Observe: 
- eclipse/.metadata/.config/platform.config and platform.cfg.metadata/
- eclipse/.metadata/.plugins/org.eclipse.update.core/ exists (contents below)
- eclipse/.metadata/.log as follows:
============

==========

7. Start Eclipse with same workspace

Observe: Eclipse exits very quickly (does not write a log).

8. Delete eclipse/.metadata/.config/platform.config and platform.cfg.metadata/
9. Start Eclipse with same workspace

Observe: Eclipse starts; something in the .config is upsetting it.

I suspect that the about dialog is causing update core to somehow
corrupt the configutration info.
Here's a shorter way to cause the same symptoms:

1. Start Eclipse with a brand new workspace
2. Open the Update Manager
3. Exit Eclipse
4. Start Eclipse with same workspace

Observe: Won't launch; no log. Delete .config/ and you're working again.
Here's another way to cause the same symptoms:

0. Brand new install
1. Eclipse.exe -initialize
2. Start Eclipse with default workspace

Observe: Won't launch; no log. Delete eclise/.config/ and you're working again.
When the about dialog is opened, the Update Core actually reconciles under the 
cover and creates the delta change file under 
eclipse/.metadata/.plugins/org.eclipse.update.core/

The platform.config looks good

site.0.policy=USER-EXCLUDE
eof=eof


Seems like startup cannot resolve platform:/base 
when starting using Java.exe here is what I get in the console

r

Fixed and released into ottcvs1: /home/cvs/corerepo/
Note: have NOT released into Sonia's build repository ...

The startup code was not correctly resolving platform:/base/ URLs on one of the 
codepaths. Did not pop up while self-hosting.
